name: BaselineCD4count
title: Baseline CD4 count
description: CD4 result from first CD4 test performed (such as at treatment initiation), also may be called CD4 at ART initiation or at ART start

mapping.name: Digital Adaptation Kit for Antenatal Care

element.definition: CD4 result from first CD4 test performed (such as at treatment initiation), also may be called CD4 at ART initiation or at ART start
element.comment: The 2017 person-centred monitoring guidelines included six sentinel events. However, since the publication of the guidelines, the expansion of “Treat All” policies at country level has made enrolment in care and “first CD4 test” less relevant, and the latter has since been dropped as a sentinel event, while viral load suppression has been added.
